entry.title: Will Hal Jordan be flying today?
entry.summary:
Author: rie_rotisse

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,782Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Who could say they have ever seen the blood of Green Lantern? Of Hal Jordan, nonetheless? Certainly not many.Or.Hal Jordan has gained a new habit of lobotomizing himself. Bruce wants to help. They both make each other worse.
